page.title: 04Buildings in Blackridge
page.content: In Blackridge we have a lot of new buildings. Most of our old buildings have been knocked down. We have different kinds of buildings including houses. We have semi-detached and detached. We have bungalows and cottages, and flats. In our playground there used to be an old church. Opposite the public swingpark there was a{Police Station}with cells. 13-14{Mclean Terrace}was a police station too. There was a hall built in 1910-1911 and it was knocked down in 1977, it was called{Paulo's Hall}and it had films on Saturdays and Wednesday. It had an upstairs and downstairs. The downstairs was called the{Lesser Hall}it was 6d at night for downstairs and it was 1/_ and 9d for upstairs. In{Drummond Place}there were terraces and railway cottages.
